author: d.x.o
content: I'm a bit confused about the status of https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7610. I can't find it in any hard fork, but it seems to be implemented in geth and also part of the expected behaviour in ethereum/tests?

author: _shemnon
content:
It's retroactively activated - https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7675

No transaction has been created that triggers this EIP, and hence none has been recorded on the chain, so wether or not it was activated in spurious monkey/tangerine whistle or formally recognized in Petcra is moot.
